parameters: Play Intro
Skip
Play Intro
TAL_MAP
Once you were known as the Obsidian Scribe,
said to write the destiny of empires on scrolls of darkness
and starlight. Your arcane knowledge was sought by kings
and dreaded by tyrants. Raised as a child within the
ancient civilization of Mari'dor, you were trained by a
clandestine guild of wizards known as the Starlight Order.
You were destined for greatness, your name whispered
in legend. Ironically, it was that legend that bred
betrayal from those you once called comrades. Stripped of
your arcane prowess and robbed of your valuable tomes,
you were left with nothing. And now you find yourself here,
standing on the outskirts of the small village town of
Talvare. A forgotten entity, penniless and lacking the
majestical gear everyone raved about. The warm glow of
the village on the horizon is a poor substitute for the
radiant starlight you once commanded,
but it's home... for now.
You acquired the skill Magic Bolt!
TAL_MAP
In a previous life, you were the child of esteemed nobility
in the grand kingdom of Eldria. Your days consisted of
scholarly pursuits, fencing lessons, and elaborate balls.
But your privileged life was shattered when a power-hungry
warlord seized your family estate. Stripped of your
heritage and forced into hiding, you traversed treacherous
lands always a step ahead of the warlord's ravenous hounds.
Struggling to survive, you learned the hard way the skills
of stealth, cunning, and swordplay. Years later, your
journey led you to the quaint village town of Talvare.
Worn and weary, you arrived with nothing more than tattered
clothing, no coin to your name, and no personal artifact
with you. You've gone from palace walls to a
provincial life. Yet Talvare, in its simplicity and
peaceful ambiance, offers a new beginning.
You acquired the skill Quick Strike!
TAL_MAP
You were born a humble farmer in Livelands, tilling soil
under the golden sun, content in the rhythm of sowing
and harvest. A simple amulet, your only inheritance from
a father you barely knew, sparked your absorption in
mystic arts, casting spells over potato crops and
chicken coops. However, when a fearsome draught annihilated
the community's crops, and the shadow of hunger loomed,
you were blamed for bringing a curse and banished. Now,
penniless and alone, you find yourself at the edge of the
tiny village town of Talvare, a stranger in a strange land.
You acquired the skill Magic Bolt!
TAL_MAP
You were once a street urchin in the bustling city of
Vadral, skilled in pickpocketing and deceit. However,
a botched robbery and an angry mob later, you were forced
to flee, narrowly escaping with your life. You left
everything behind, traveling through thick woods and
treacherous mountains. After weeks on the run, hungry,
bedraggled, and without a single coin, you stumble upon
the tiny village of Talvare. With no memory of anything
but survival for so long, this quaint little settlement
is your only hope for a fresh start.
You acquired the skill Quick Strike!
TAL_MAP
Raised amidst the solitude and the raw beauty of the
Craggy Peaks, you learned the language of the wind,
whispered secrets with the wild beasts, and carved your
home out of the mountainside. Born of earth and echo,
you thrived in the wilderness, living amongst the spirits
of nature. A whispered prophecy from the lips of the
ancient trees spoke of a destiny tied to chaos and
salvation. However, your harmonious existence was shattered
as a tumultuous storm, like no other, riddled your
mountaintop home, robbing you of your only worldly
possessions. At the storm's end, you were led by an ethereal
force to the small village of Talvare. Bereft of coin and
belongings, the humble village has become your new terrain
to navigate, a stark contrast to the boundless
wilderness you've known.
You acquired the skill Double Slash!
TAL_MAP
In yet another lifetime, you were a member of an elite band
of assassins, the Night's Shade - ghosts flitting through
the dark, silencing whispers, stopping hearts. Your hands
were stained with guilt and regret - unwanted trophies from
jobs done for gold. However, when a kill went wrong and
affected the innocent, you fled from the hands of your
soulless brethren, leaving behind your tools of trade and
the safety of darkness. Now, devoid of your dark cloak
and deadly weapons, you find yourself standing at the edge
of the humble village of Talvare. Bitter memories fold into
the night as dawn approaches. Penniless, possessionless,
but resolved, you see the village in the early morning
light. This is your chance at redemption -
or at least, at peace.
You acquired the skill Double Slash!
TAL_MAP
Descended from an ancient lineage of seers, you were bathed
in starlight and swaddled in dreams as a youngling in the
spirited realm of Zephyra. Endowed with the gift of second
sight and plunged into a world of cosmic symphony,
you lived intertwined with mystical threads of time and
existence. Immersing in the dream river comes with a price,
you foresaw a terrible fate befalling on your people but
you were powerless to divert the courses of destiny.
Wracked with remorse and haunted by your failure, you sought
isolation. Stripped of your ethereal possessions and the
celestial wealth of Zephyra, you traverse the mundane world
as a nomad. Ultimately, your path leads you to the small
and simple village town of Talvare. Penniless and invisible,
you find restless peace in its quiet lanes and humble folks,
the mystical echoes of your past pervading your present.
You acquired the skill Magic Bolt!
TAL_MAP
Growing up as an orphan in the bustling city of Kartigan,
survival meant trading your innocence for skills in sneaking
and stealing. The hard city life forged you into a
self-reliant and quick-thinking individual, well versed in
the language of the streets. Eventually, a scam went south,
and you had to flee to save your skin. Now, one desperate,
and broke voyage later, you find yourself at the doorstep
of the small village town of Talvare. In this peaceful
corner of the world, stripped of the city's noise and
dangers, you have the opportunity to start over.
The possibilities are as endless and unknown as the path
that led you here.
You acquired the skill Quick Strike!
TAL_MAP
Once, you were a feared pirate captain sailing the Stormy
Seas, notorious under the epithet 'Wave Wraith'. With your
loyal crew and formidable ship, The Sea Specter, you claimed
wealth from the rich and formidable, living a life of
dangerous freedom. Your name echoed across taverns, bringing
both terror and awe. However, a treacherous mutiny led by
your closest confidante left you abandoned on a deserted
island with not even a rusty cutlass to your name. After a
perilous journey of evasion, survival, and confrontation
with your inner demons, you washed up on the shore near the
silent village of Talvare. Bereft and penniless,
your past seemed as distant as the sea you once ruled.
This humble hamlet offered an unfamiliar respite,
a chance to rebuild amid its unsuspecting inhabitants.
You acquired the skill Double Slash!
TAL_MAP
As a gifted blacksmith in the grand city of Durin's Keep,
your name was synonymous with excellence and creativity.
You were esteemed for transmuting ordinary metal into
extraordinary masterpieces. However, your life turned to
ashes when a ruthless lord envious of your fame falsely
accused you of conspiracy, stripping off your wealth, honor
and the joy of forging. With nothing left but scars and
shattered dreams, you embarked on a vagabond journey,
ultimately leading you to the small village of Talvare.
This hamlet, untouched by the grandeur and conspiracy of
city life, promises a fresh start. You arrive penniless,
robbed of your tools, and bereft of your creations.
But determination fuels your spirit, to rise from the ashes,
to shape your destiny just as you once shaped metal.
You acquired the skill Double Slash!
TAL_MAP
You were the shadow that flirted with the dark corners of
the grand kingdom of Heliohart. Known as the Night Prowler,
your hands danced in many a pocket, stealing baubles,
secrets, and sometimes, lives. Infamy was your cloak,
cunning, your weapon. You thrived in the adrenaline of
danger, but a foul setup by a traitorous ally landed you in
the kingdoms' most dreaded dungeons. However, fate had a
cruel sense of humor. A bloody riot within the heartless
stone walls offered you a thrilling chance at escape. Now,
running from your past and the kingdom's bloodhounds, you've
discovered asylum in the tranquil setting of Talvare.
Adorned in a facade of an ordinary townsperson and void of
any wealth or tools of your dark trade, the small village
is your sanctuary...or your new playground.
You acquired the skill Quick Strike!
TAL_MAP
Growing up as a baker's son in the town of Fairgrove, your
life was as simple as the loaves you kneaded. The scent of
fresh bread was your morning greeting, and the gratitude of
filled bellies, your nightly farewell. A falling-out over
family matters led to a harrowing night when you were forced
to leave home with nothing but the rough-spun tunic on your
back. After weeks of darting through forests and sleeping
under the stars, you stumble upon the village of Talvare.
Empty pockets echoing the emptiness in your belly, you are
drawn to its calm - a beacon of hope for a life you
can knead back into shape. Your story is about to unfold
like an uncooked loaf, ready for the heat of the oven.
You acquired the skill Quick Strike!
TAL_MAP
Born and raised under the lush canopy of the Verdant
Whisper, you lived as one with the forest, understanding its
language and cherishing its bountiful offerings. You were
the Forest's Whisper, moving with grace among the trees,
communing with animals, and leaving no trace behind.
Steeped in the ancient secrets of the wilderness, you led
a life of peaceful isolation. But when fire swept through
the forest, blazing your home and life into ashes and smoke,
you were left with no choice but to abandon your sanctuary.
After long, weary weeks of travel, you find yourself on the
threshold of the small village of Talvare. Stripped of your
symbiosis with the forest and bare of possessions, the
village seems a peculiar dwelling. But perhaps it could
offer a new beginning, a fire clearing the way
for fresh growth.
You acquired the skill Double Slash!
TAL_MAP
In the lofty halls of the Ivory Citadel, you were a
renowned scholar, your wisdom echoing in the corridors
of power. Your research and erudition on ancient runes won
favor with the highest echelons of society. Life was a
tapestry woven with threads of knowledge and power,
for better or worse. But when the Citadel's lord, entranced
by dark magic, sought to use your knowledge for dire
notions, you opposed him, only to face grave consequences.
Escaping in the dead of night, you were stripped of your
resources and status. Now, as destiny would have it, you
stand at the entrance of the humble village of Talvare.
Possessionless but not powerless, you foresee serenity in
this quaint village, buried in oblivion -
a tranquil echo to your turbulent past.
You acquired the skill Magic Bolt!
TAL_MAP
In the vibrant mercantile city of Solantha, you were an
influential tradesman, adept at the art of negotiation.
With your gilded tongue and quick wit, you were successful
and wealthy beyond measure, your name echoed with respect
in the bustling market square. Yet power and money, as
enticing as they may be, also breed enemies. Betrayed by a
trusted associate over a trade deal gone awry, you found
yourself accused of crimes you didn't commit. Abandoned and
with your wealth seized, you escaped into the night.
Skirting unknown lands and hostile paths, you are now a
mere silhouette at the outskirts of the small village
town of Talvare. Moneyless, nameless, yet hopeful,
you stand at the precipice of a life that holds promise
for a fresh bargain.
You acquired the skill Quick Strike!
TAL_MAP
You were a monk of the Silent Shores monastery, located
high in the Impossible Peaks. Abandoning worldly needs,
you sought enlightenment through meditation and
interpretation of ancient scrolls. A life defined by quiet
contemplation and spiritual understanding was disrupted when
your sanctuary was razed to the ground by marauders, seeking
the ancient knowledge hidden within your sacred abode. With
the wisdom of ancients but, without any material
possessions, you found yourself wandering toward the quiet
village of Talvare. Unacquainted with the bustle of mundane
life and stripped of every material need, you hope to find
harmony in the peaceful hum of these untouched lives,
a melody of quiet existence. The whispering winds of
Talvare are far from your lost sanctuary, yet they carry a
similar promise of finding tranquility amid chaos.
You acquired the skill Magic Bolt!
TAL_MAP
Once, you were a revered guardian of the Sacred Grove,
dwelling amidst lively, whispering leaves and ancient
wisdom. The forest was your shelter and guide; the creatures
therein were your companions. You lived in harmony with
nature, your ability to commune with it being your greatest
strength. However, darkness fell as savage marauders
plundered the grove, leaving you devoid of your dwelling,
purpose, and companions. With sorrow in your heart and
nothing more than the ordinary clothes on your back, you
embarked on a journey that led you to the serene village of
Talvare. Stripped of your emerald sanctuary, although
penniless and seemingly ordinary, the village's raw and
naive connection to its surrounding nature offers a
semblance of home. In this humble dwelling, perhaps,
you could plant the seeds of a new beginning.
You acquired the skill Double Slash!
TAL_MAP
Brought up in the intimidating ranks of the Royal Vanguard
of Kaspard, your life was a string of demanding drills,
stringent discipline, and relentless strength tests.
Wielding a mean blade and an unyielding spirit, you rose
through the ranks, your honed instincts and steadfast
loyalty placing you amongst the elite, always ready for the
call to glory and honor. That dawn came, but it was as
bitter as the chill of death. A bloody coup orchestrated by
treacherous insiders annihilated your comrades, but you,
narrowly escaped, were named the traitor. Deprived of your
position, honor, and everything you owned, you fled to
evade wrongful accusations, traversing danger-ridden
pathways. Your turbulent saga led you to the quiet,
unsuspecting village of Talvare. Penniless and seemingly
insignificant, this small village promises a refuge, a
place to heal, to prove your innocence, and perhaps, to
reclaim lost glory.
You acquired the skill Double Slash!
TAL_MAP
You were once known as the greatest gladiator of the
infamous arenas of Calliphas. Your fiery spirit and
proficiency in combat were admired by crowd and challengers
alike. Thrust into the ruthless world of gladiatorial combat
as a prisoner, the roar of bloodthirsty spectators was your
lullaby and the clash of steel, your calling. However,
everything changed the day you spared your opponent's life,
defying the brutal rules of the arena. Punished for your act
of defiance, you escaped your chains, leaving your life as a
celebrated warrior behind. With no coin in your pocket, nor
a weapon at your side, you've reached the peaceful village
of Talvare. This small hamlet, quiet and unhurried, offers
a stark contrast to the savage life you're accustomed to,
but perhaps it's a chance for a new existence beyond the
shadow of the bloodbaths.
You acquired the skill Quick Strike!
TAL_MAP
You, a humble apprentice of the benevolent wizard Myrddin,
lived a life secluded in the mystical Greatwood Forest.
Days merged into nights as you learnt the art of weaving
magic and deciphering ancient scrolls. Forest creatures were
your companions, and under starlit canopies, your magic
bloomed. But your tranquility was punctured when an evil
sorcerer cursed Myrddin deep into an eternal slumber and,
in his wrath, razed your dwelling. Rendered penniless,
orphans of your protective forest, you escaped with nothing
more than your half-learnt spells. Guided by a falcon sent
by your slumbering master, you've made your way to the
quiet village of Talvare, devoid of any riches or arcane
tools. This is your new crossroads, where a boy abandoned
by fate evolves into a man that makes his own.
You acquired the skill Magic Bolt!
Skip
